website_summaries.verdict: Keeps you dry through southern heat and intense workouts, and does it without marking your clothing.
pros: Green tea has anti-bacterial properties that eliminates the need for harsh alcohol
Leaves no white residue on clothing
cons: Make sure it dries before dressing

customer_reviews.title: Finally my problem is gone!
customer_reviews.text: My Doctor recommended a green tea deodorant for my armpit problem. Tried everything that didn't work and found your product and am thrilled. The green tea has anti-bacterial properties without the harshness of alcohol that I was desperately using to help with the problem and wasn't working. I'm so happy that I can use this and not worry about armpit odor.....
customer_reviews.author: Barbara1948

customer_reviews.title: Quite unique deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of allergies, and pretty much any type of deodorant (including the more recent ones that we apply ourselves with fingers) I tried either does not work or I get a reaction that makes things worse (fun fun). This one has been the only one for many years that is working just fine, not a strong scent, no reaction, doesn't prevent proper sweating, etc. The only downside is that the company clearly doesn't care about making a better packaging since it has not changed in... 20 years or so?
customer_reviews.author: N. B.

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Gentle, creamy soft application plus powerful protection from underarm odor. Better than anything you find on drugstore shelf. Leaves no white residue on clothing. No strong scent to overpower you or your own cologne. Can skip a day use and it still protects and controls body odor. I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant! Whole day smell nice!
customer_reviews.text: I had the bottle of perfume long time ago when I live in Ukraine, and now I buy deodorant here in US. It is so nice! One of my few favorites! Interesting way it made as a cream. Clever idea!
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to apply
customer_reviews.text: When you twist the container nothing happens and then it squirts out a bunch of the liquidy product. It's incomparable to the solids or sprays that are far more convenient. The substance works and smells well but the inconvenience of the application has forced me to put it aside.
customer_reviews.author: YaleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not working!
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this deodorant, but it totally does not work as I expected it too, the smell lasts for only a few hours and for the price or such a little bottle totally NOT worth it!!!! The new charcoal ones at Walmart work way better!
customer_reviews.author: GR Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your deodorant for life!!!  I’ll never switch.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this deodorant!!! I have used it since my mother got me to try Elizabeth Arden’s original fragrance Blue Grass when I was in my late teens and the cost was like 99 cents. I would never change products. I even have my daughter using it. Nice fragrance and doesn’t leave any white or yellow staining in the underarm area.
customer_reviews.author: gardenmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the quirks
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful but it squirts out quickly. Also when you go to use it again there is a sharp point left from residual deodorant lotion that dried. So if you remember to wipe off after use it's fine. Love the frangrance but weird issues
customer_reviews.author: Joannie123

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $12
customer_reviews.text: The smell is lovely! The product....not so much. The product dispenses from a small hole which dries up after each use - If you're not careful, it will come squirting out. It does not help wetness or odor and the container is so small, it's not worth $12 when it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smell is amazing and it works great to keep me smelling nice
customer_reviews.text: The smell is amazing and it works great to keep me smelling nice, but the packaging is horrid. It has a little hold at the top, which gets clogged up immediately. Now every time I go to pump it out it'll twist twice with nothing then explode up. Because of this I'm always super wary and always have to end up putting it on with my fingers, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but not enough and too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Not enough product in the tube , but it works and smells very nice
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: I like the deodorant I wish you could still get the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the deodorant I wish you could still get the other one on her also but I have not seen it in a while I like both of them the one with the blue cap smells great also both of them hold me all day they are truly life savers
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great deoderant for people with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my family member because she can't use any of the main brands sold at pharmacies and she really likes them. They have a great smell and seem to work great with no clothes stain at all. My only complaint is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Botero

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use one of their other “flavors” but I like this one much more. Light and pleasant. And, of course, the most important part, effective! I shower every other day and this deodorant easily lasts both days for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Paul

customer_reviews.title: Deivce is not working to dispence
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product...It lasted through one application....device to deliver cream will not work...I chose Green Tea as you were out of blue Grass and didn't feel it was worth the postage to send it back....would not recommend.....
customer_reviews.author: Esther V. Benn

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite deodorant ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best deodorant that I have ever used..I also LOVE the Red door scent.The protection it provides is long lasting,even with strenuous exercise,and in the heat of the summer..I have not found that with other deodorants.It is a cream based deodorant and comes out rather quickly if you are not careful,but I would not use anything else..Truly the best deodorant for women,beautiful fresh(not at all overpowering) scent...provides unbeatable protection all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: No Bueno! Think I was sent an old bottle!! :-( or thin just allergic!! Either way want try this again!!
customer_reviews.author: AUfan4life

customer_reviews.title: Beats that GA heat!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many other deodorants prescription and OTC but nothing seemed to really work on me. My mother-in-law mentioned this brand in passing and I tried it, to my surprise I stayed dry and smelling fresh all day. Even in 96 degrees southern humidity. Well worth the price I hope they never stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: tracie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I have used Elizabeth Arden Blue Grass for more years than I care to admit. Unfortunately, it wasn't available so I'm trying Green Tea. With the Elizabeth Arden name, I'm sure it'll be great.
customer_reviews.author: B. DENTON

customer_reviews.title: Good but better labeling
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, it smells good, however, the ingredients should be stated boldly out front on the label, this has aluminum. It lasts throughout the day. It should be stated: Antiperspirant deodorant so everyone would know it has aluminum in it, I would not have purchased it, aluminum is not healthy for our brain. All in all it smells great and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love the deodorant but no matter how you store it or how slow you turn the applicator, it sports out everytime
customer_reviews.author: maureen mckinney

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST DEODORANT ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE USED THIS PRODUCT FOR OVER 20 YEARS AND IT IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.author: LILLY

customer_reviews.title: Nee More
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but you Ms. Arden could afford to add more product in your container. Too little for too much money
customer_reviews.author: Devora

customer_reviews.title: Live this product
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and thought I’ll try it. It’s consistently, smell and longevity exceed other deodorants
customer_reviews.author: Jan Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite deodorant.
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, light, non-greasy, absorbs and leaves you fresh and light all day. Hands down my favorite deodorant year round and happy to have found it on here for such a great price. I am very surprised it works as well as it does as I am not a huge fan of the rest of the EA line. This is the only item of theirs I use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: omgbart

customer_reviews.title: I like the Elizabeth Arden deodorants
customer_reviews.text: I like the Elizabeth Arden deodorants, however there is nothing like the Blue Grass deodorant. This was a close second.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! Been using for years ,now I buy through this vendor ,easier for me .try the cologne spray
customer_reviews.author: Robin Steinfeld

customer_reviews.title: Easy transaction with fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and stays with me all day and evening.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love this deodorant!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this deodorant for years! Love the scent & how it works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was organic. But that was more of my fault than theirs. Should of done better research. Like every other deodorant towards the end it magically stopped working. But it did well at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good product and poor packaging. leaks
customer_reviews.text: Poor packaging. Wish i could return. Not what i expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love it but way too overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant. I can go two days without reapplying. The scent is very delicate. What I don't like is the price. It's way overpriced. On ThePerfumeSpot.com is almost 1/2 off....
customer_reviews.author: Johanna V.

customer_reviews.title: I guess i did not care for the product, ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess i did not care for the product, because i was expecting a fabulous smell emitting from my body. Most people would not want such a thing. But I also need a stronger deodorant . :{
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Deodorant!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best deodorant. It does not irritate my skin, it goes on smoothly and has a nice fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Always keeps me dry - Elizabeth Arden Green Tea and ...
customer_reviews.text: Always keeps me dry - Elizabeth Arden Green Tea and Blue Grass - the only deodorants I have worn for years and many of my friends have switched over to it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Big desapp. Every time you use it ...the liquid has formed a dry spot, that when you roll on squeezes out like crazy! But it is a good product though!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen , LMFT

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant really surpassed my expectations! I live in a warm climate and it lasts all day. I've tried numerous deodorants because I sweat profusely under my arms. After using this product, I no longer have to use my prescription deodorant. This is great product, I would recommend this to anyone! Thanks Elizabeth Arden, please don't ever stop making this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corrin

customer_reviews.title: The smell is pretty strong for a woman fragrance and I don't like ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell is pretty strong for a woman fragrance and I don't like the way u apply it. Will not order it again.
customer_reviews.author: AlbTech

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell and the product, but not the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product - it smells nice, works well and goes on well. But I dropped it once and the lid cracked, and now I have to keep it in a baggie so it does not leak. Seems pretty cheap to make a lid that will not break so easily. Otherwise, good product and one I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Barnes

customer_reviews.title: As i expected
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this product. I love it so much i use it for about 7 years now. And since its kind of expencive in stores i start looking this Green Tea by Elizabeth Arden, over the amazon. And was surprised when i saw it for twice cheeper. Highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Longtime User of this Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant but it is expensive. I have been a faithful user for the past five years. I didn't give it a 5-star rating because of the the cost. This deodorant is long-lasting and it doesn't leave white marks on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only deodorant I use
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Lasts all day. Literally the only deodorant I use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Smells fabulous
customer_reviews.text: The first day I wore it my co-worker had to endure my constant updates on how amazing my armpits smelled. Considering I'm someone that NEVER discusses personal hygiene proves it's one fantastic product. Seriously though, my armpits do smell delectable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellarie

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS and works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The twist up cream formula is new to me bit the scent and deodorant both work like a charm, love this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi E Scottsdale AZ USA

customer_reviews.title: No sticky white residue
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, long lasting and doesn't leave white residues or sticky feeling. I don't have to apply more than once a day, even if I work out.
customer_reviews.author: Pascale Noland

customer_reviews.title: Container issue
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this deodorant for years. This is first time that the container is faulty and I cannot dispense deodorant without taking it apart.
customer_reviews.author: pnelson

customer_reviews.title: is good
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I want to try the blue grass
customer_reviews.author: filerma

customer_reviews.title: A must have for me!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Once you get used to using a cream, this is the best on earth. Regular deodorants always seemed to be a masking scent, this is clean, fresh and lasts for days if necessary! A true find.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk in TX

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit pricey, this product really works great for me. I'd always used the Bluegrass one but wanted to try the Green tea. I wasn't disappointed. It works the same and I love the fragrance of the Green tea.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: One of the best deodorants I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best deodorants I’ve ever used. It lasts all day and truly prevents wetness. It does not stain at all, completely invisible once it’s dried. And it leaves my skin smooth. Totally worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna B

customer_reviews.title: Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for decades! It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best deodorant ever! Works all day long and smells so fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Tawny Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant
customer_reviews.text: This is the only deodorant that works for me! It manages smell and sweat. Will continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Great Smelling Long-Lasting Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It's long lasting and smells great. The twist-style application takes some getting used to and requires a gentle twist to avoid product waste.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki England

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite deodorant! I been using it for years. Doesn't leave marks on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Mell88

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well with my body chemistry
customer_reviews.text: I usually like Elizabeth Arden products over all but the green tea deodorant just did not work for me. It has a sharp fragrance that just smelled bad after application and did not last more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: bonny

customer_reviews.title: unstoppable protection
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this deodorant for years. I work out a lot and this is the only deodorant that last throughout my workout and more. I love it
customer_reviews.author: CFD

customer_reviews.title: The fragrance is delightful.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Elizabeth Arden deodorant because I only need to apply a very little. It keeps me confident that I remain dry and odor free.
customer_reviews.author: Melba Daniel

customer_reviews.title: ... I know from the past that the product is great! However when I got it there was no ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I know from the past that the product is great! However when I got it there was no cap on it and pretty much everything had leaked out into the box so that was a big mess! Great product though (when it's not a mess ...)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Birk

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I found this deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I found this deodorant! It works so well. Even when it's super hot and humid outside this deodorant never wears off. It keeps my pits smelling fresh and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Bostick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. Not as effective as blue grass
customer_reviews.author: Dots

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fragrance & it stayed sticky in my arm pits.
customer_reviews.author: mnpammer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good
customer_reviews.text: Really like the light scent. It works great and it is one of the few deodorants that does not cause an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Steele

customer_reviews.title: The smell is amazing, as well as the texture of the cream
customer_reviews.text: The smell is amazing, as well as the texture of the cream. I would give it 5 starts, but the bottle it comes in is very cheap. For me, it broke after 10 uses? I was very gentle with it and am disappointed with the screw mechanism within this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Carly S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to many deodorants. Elizabeth Arden is the only one that works for me. I love the green tea scent.
customer_reviews.author: Barbydoll

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Both this for the wife and she is in love, she said has always enjoyed the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this deodorant fades throughout the day, along with its effect. Because it is a cream deodorant, you need to make sure you let it dry before getting dressed. Otherwise, it will rub off on your clothes and not work. It smells great, but it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to find the Elizabeth Arden stuff on line and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find the Elizabeth Arden stuff on line and it came so quickly. The price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Preston

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good. Careful when squeezing it will squeeze everywhere go slow
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Best deodorant I’ver used keep you smelling fresh for days no more body odor very gentle
customer_reviews.author: bea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant. It is smooth, lightly scented, and long lasting. It is the best deodorant I have ever used. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant!
customer_reviews.text: Great deodorant. Love it - not sticky, great fragrance, sweet and light, texture is awesome, works great. I will get another one.
customer_reviews.author: kamran arab

customer_reviews.title: Strong Smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this deodorant is too strong for my taste. I just couldn't get past it. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: SabinaEarthling

customer_reviews.title: very sweet and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: The cream is a little too runny. But the smell is as always, very sweet and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Mel G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good keeps me dry under arms and smells really good very mild
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best deodorant ever. I have used this and Blue Grass by Eliz. Arden for over 20 years. Works!
customer_reviews.author: Enid Barnes

customer_reviews.title: greentea deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Timing was up to par I can, t complain. I could not ask for more.the product itself i realy like.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Green Tea by Elizabeth Arden,1.5 Ounce
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite deodorant by Elizabeth Arden ,compared to all the other brands I have used I find this one provides me with 24 hr protection the smell is awesome not over powering .This is a cream so when you first turn it to use it some may squirt out but should only happen when you first twist it open ,This doesn't leave the un wanted stains on my clothing either as long as they keep making this I will buy it
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Cake Decorating

customer_reviews.title: Efficient if you can take out
customer_reviews.text: The cream doesn't want to come out. The little that I could get was efficient the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Miki69

customer_reviews.title: This one is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I perspire more than most females and no other deodorants were helping. This one is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Edwards

customer_reviews.title: My Fave!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and this is the best deodorant ever! I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Cally

customer_reviews.title: I still like the fragrance free deodorants
customer_reviews.text: I still like the fragrance free deodorants. I have only used it a couple of times, and do not know how well it works in stressful situations.
customer_reviews.author: Runy

customer_reviews.title: I thought that the fregrence will be more like the green tea perfume of Elizabeth Arden but it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the fregrence will be more like the green tea perfume of Elizabeth Arden but it's not similar. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Meenakshi sharma

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product and speedy service Amazon always provides!
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET C. THARP

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this deodorant, but it is just too messy! First of all, the deodorant I received came without the green top. Then, I kept turning it, and nothing happened to the point that I thought that I received an empty tube. Then all of a sudden, it spewed a tablespoon-full of the cream. The "leaking" continued afterward. Maybe it is summer heat that is making the cream slowly crawl out of the tube, maybe it is poor design, but it keeps squirting whenever I slowly turn the base (and then it oozes out when I am not using it).
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: It’s a quality product for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant because it lasts all day and the scent smells pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: patricia holloway

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER HAD A PROBLEM WITH OTHER DEODORANTS TILL I FOUND THIS PRODUCT. IT HAVE A GREAT SMELLS AND STAYS FRESH FOR LONG. SHOULD OF BEEN A LIL BIGGER BUT GOOD THINGS COME IN SMALL PACKAGES.

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The deodorant itself was fine. The deodorant dispenser broke immediately. The bottom part that you turn stopped pushing the product up the second time I used it. I was able to pull down and push some of the product out the next two times I used it. I used it about 4 times and it was empty. I really don't think I used that much in 4 days. I would not recommend this product due to the packaging. It is nonreturnable through Amazon so I spend $10 on deodorant that I used 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works well; the only reasons I gave it 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well; the only reasons I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is due to the application ~ it squirts out, and is a little clumsy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Best deoderant ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Best I've ever used! Even lasts through my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very light scent but most importantly does what it's suppose to! It's also great for when you have a black shirt/dress on that is sleeveless; won't leave deodorant marks.
customer_reviews.author: marienn

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: awesome product, highly recommend, it doesn't stain your clothes or cause any problems if you shave and use after. love it, used it for years...
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love the fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Love the fragrance, but do not care for the liquid deodorant. I sometimes use with my other anti-perspirant deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Messer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works to keep my perspiration and odor to a minimum but isn't yelling that I'm wearing a "perfume".
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M Godden

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too much product squirts out when twisting to use, even when turning extremely slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but packaging needs works
customer_reviews.text: This smells nice. But the twist to release the liquid deodorant is a poor design. I sometimes twist and nothing comes out. Then I wait and twist again and it comes springing out. Overall not bad but if you are big on getting the bang for your buck or about the experience of ease of use, just be aware of the hiccups.
customer_reviews.author: TruthRevealer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I love Elizabeth Arden deodorant and habe been using it for years. The product smells nice, but it just seems over the years they put less and less product into the bottle and it empties very quickly. None the less, I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Oceanfront

customer_reviews.title: great!!
customer_reviews.text: love the smeell! so pure and natural! great brand, also it does the job very well! will re purchase for sure
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant works better than any other for me. I guess it was made for my body chemistry. Other brands smell weird on me, but this smells wonderful. It isn't overpowering either. The only con is that you have to let it dry. It is still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor R. Rabon

customer_reviews.title: you have toi triy it
customer_reviews.text: I rate this prioduct 5 because its so clean and fresh, I always liked Elizabeth Arden's product . I recommend for all the woman to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

product_meta.title: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Cream Deodorant, 1.5 oz
product_meta.description:
Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Cream Deodorant, 1.5 oz.

BRAND STORY
From a lush, green world of freshness comes Elizabeth Arden Green Tea, the fragrance that energizes the body, excites the senses and invigorates the spirit.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
